title: Battery not charging after July security update.
content:
After the July security update, my Pixel 2 started having charging problems. I plug in my charger and cable and the phone recognizes it (icon changes and the battery screen shows that it is charging) but the phone doesn't charge. I shut down and restart with the same charger and cable and charging then happens normally.

Is anyone else experiencing this? I'm assuming it's a bug but does anyone have a workaround?

UPDATE - This turned out to be a problem with the USB-C port on my Pixel 2.
